original_text: I also made my covenant with them. I promised to give them the land of Canaan, where they were living as foreign people.
korean_text: 가나안 땅 곧 그들이 거류하는 땅을 그들에게 주기로 그들과 언약하였더니

sentences.original_text: I also made my covenant with them.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 또한 그들과 나의 언약을 맺었습니다.

sentences.original_text: I promised to give them the land of Canaan,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들에게 가나안 땅을 주겠다고 약속했습니다.

sentences.original_text: where they were living as foreign people.
